content.raw:
I saw a crash like this while detaching a prismatic joint in Gazebo 9.2.0 .

I don't have the traceback handy, but before the segfault in ODE callback it was in `ApplyStiffnessDamping()`. It was called as a callback [registered here](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/01c7f8b1d68448bc618b575ad1c7ec13fee2b87f/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEJoint.cc#lines-1074) when `Model::Update()` [updated its joints](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/01c7f8b1d68448bc618b575ad1c7ec13fee2b87f/gazebo/physics/Model.cc#lines-310).

One possible fix is to not update a joint if has been detached.

I saw a crash like this while detaching a prismatic joint in Gazebo 9.2.0 .

I don't have the traceback handy, but before the segfault in ODE callback it was in ApplyStiffnessDamping(). It was called as a callback registered here when Model::Update() updated its joints.

One possible fix is to not update a joint if has been detached.
